news.title: Schloss Bangalore invests ₹1,131 crore to develop five properties
news.para: ​Schloss Bangalore, which is launching its Rs 3,500 crore Initial Public Offer (IPO) on Monday, operates the hospitality brand Leela Palaces Hotels & Resorts. The company currently has 13 hotels, out of which 5 are company-owned while the other 8 are under its management.

news.title: Existing home sales in USA unexpectedly fall in April 2025
news.para: Home sales slipped 0.5% last month to a seasonally adjusted annual rate of 4.00 million units, the National Association of Realtors said on Thursday. Economists polled by Reuters had forecast home resales would rise to a rate of 4.10 million units.

news.title: Google renews 8.7 lakh sq ft office lease in Bengaluru's Bagmane Capital Business Park
news.para: The lease—among the largest renewal signed so far in 2025—spans two landmark towers, Kyoto East and Kyoto West, underscoring the technology giant’s bold expansion drive in India’s tech capital.

news.title: Centre to consider Bengaluru metro phase-2, 3A proposals: Housing minister
news.para: ​​Expressing satisfaction over the progress of various missions, the Union Minister said the revised cost of Bangalore Metro Phase-2 project will be considered once the proposal is approved by the state cabinet.

news.title: Embassy Developments raises ₹10.6 billion from warrants conversion
news.para: "This infusion of capital strengthens our balance sheet and our ability to scale operations while creating sustained value for all stakeholders,” said Sachin Shah, CEO & executive director of Embassy Developments.

news.title: Less than 2% buildings in Telangana sought fire NOC in last seven years
news.para: According to officials, this limitation has led to widespread neglect of fire safety measures in buildings below the stipulated height, which account for 99% of fire accidents.

news.title: Kanakia Group seeks NLCT nod to demerge real estate arm
news.para: The group has approached the Mumbai bench of the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) to seek approval for the demerger of Kanakia Spaces Realty Pvt Ltd and Transparent Developers Pvt Ltd.

news.title: Kanodia Cement files draft IPO papers with Sebi
news.para: The IPO is entirely an Offer For Sale (OFS) of 1.49 crore shares by promoters and an individual shareholder, with no fresh issue component, according to the draft red herring prospectus (DRHP) filed on Thursday.

news.title: Vizag metro works to start in October: Andhra Pradesh urban development minister
news.para: Narayana said that a detailed project report (DPR) for Vizag metro project has been submitted for a double-decker model.

news.title: Guwahati civic body launches drive to install 60 high-mast LED lights
news.para: GMC on Thursday inaugurated two new high-mast LED lights at Kahilipara and Lokhra. This comprehensive lighting drive is being implemented in collaboration with Guwahati Unnayan Company Ltd. (GUCL) as part of the city's ongoing modernisation efforts.

news.title: Odisha plans corpus fund to protect land rights of SC/STs
news.para: As per plan, land sold by members of SC/ST community would be sold only to members of that particular community so that the total land under the possession of SCs and STs doesn't decrease.

news.title: Pay property tax by June 30 & get 10% discount: Navi Mumbai civic body
news.para: Among the other initiatives to encourage timely tax payments and boost civic revenue is the implementation of a single annual bill distribution system from 2025-26, replacing the earlier practice of distributing bills twice a year.

news.title: Pay up before May 31, property tax rebate period won’t be extended: Chandigarh civic body
news.para: The civic body has clarified that for cash and online payments, May 31 is the last date to avail of the rebate. However, those who wish to pay through cheques and demand drafts will have to do so by May 27.

news.title: RMC plants to be banned in residential areas of Ahmedabad
news.para: ​​"RMC plants in residential areas are contributing to air pollution. We are formulating a new policy, and orders for their relocation will be issued in the next two months," Dani said during the standing committee meeting on Thursday.

news.title: SRA invites tenders for ten slum redevelopment schemes in Mumbai
news.para: The authority has invited bids for redevelopment of ten stalled slum redevelopment schemes at Andheri West, Antop Hill in Wadala, Goregaon, Jogeshwari Vikhroli Link Road, Vikhroli, Chembur and Deonar.

news.title: Over 75 residential societies in Ahmedabad sign for redevelopment in Jan-Apr 2025
news.para: Developers say the threat of rising jantri rates in early 2025 pushed many societies to fast-track approvals. Meanwhile, recent court judgments have helped streamline the consent process — especially in cases where 75% of members are in favour, leading to fewer legal hurdles.

news.title: Pune: Case against realty firm’s three directors on charge of duping buyers in two projects
news.para: The complainant, a resident of Hinjewadi, stated that the company took money by impressing upon them that it got permission to build up to 10 floors in either project.

news.title: Land pooling policy designed to foster development: Punjab finance minister
news.para: The policy marks a significant departure from past practices, prioritising voluntary participation and empowering landowners to become active stakeholders in the state's progress, he said.
